content: *note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com this collection of dish cloths and towels is the perfect addition to any modern or rustic kitchen great for washing drying or just looking pretty with this pattern you get instructions for three towels - dish cloth 8 5 x 8 5 - dish towel 13 x 21 - hanging towel 8 5 x 19 pattern includes -detailed instructions for 3 different dish cloths/towels -photos for reference -link to free video tutorial -gauge difficulty easy supplies needed medium 4 weight cotton 5 00mm h hook yarn needle scissors 1 toggle button for hanging towel standard us crochet terms
